content.content: 1. The line known as the Hamilton Light Rail Transit (LRT) line, extending east from McMaster University, is prescribed for the purposes of clause (e) of the definition of “priority transit project” in section 2 of the Act.
content.raw_html: 1. The line known as the Hamilton Light Rail Transit (LRT) line, extending east from McMaster University, is prescribed for the purposes of clause (e) of the definition of “priority transit project” in section 2 of the Act.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
